name: mathematica-check
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that allows MCP clients (like Cursor) to execute Mathematica code via wolframscript and verify mathematical derivations.

tools.name: execute_mathematica
tools.description: Execute Mathematica code and return the result

code.description: Mathematica code to execute. Should be a complete, self-contained code block
code.title: Code

format.description: Output format (text or mathematica). Defaults to text
format.title: Format

tools.name: verify_derivation
tools.description: Verify a mathematical derivation step by step using Mathematica's Simplify

steps.description: Array of mathematical expressions (as strings) representing steps in a derivation. Requires at least two steps
steps.title: Steps

format.description: Output format for the verification report (text or mathematica). Defaults to text
format.title: Format
